Meri Morrissey (amuru 1949) bu onye odee akwukwo n' America   na onye na-akwado mmegide umu uwa
Ọ bụ onye odee nke Iwuli Ubi Nrọ Gị, nke na-agwa Morrissey mgba na nkuzi sitere na ndụ nwata ya
Ọ bụkwa onye odee nkeỌ dịghị ihe na-erughị ịdị ukwuu, akwụkwọ gbasara mmekọrịta ọgwụgwọ
Na 2002 ọ chịkọtara ma dezie akwụkwọ New Thought: A Practical Spirituality
Onye edemede America bụ Wayne Dyer kpọrọ ya "otu n'ime ndị nkụzi kacha eche echiche nke oge anyị."
N'ịbụ onye na-arụ ọrụ site na mmalite ọrụ ya na ọrụ enyemaka mba ụwa, Morrissey kwadoro Association for Global New Thought na 1995 ma bụrụ onye isi oche mbụ ya
N'afọ 1997, o sonyeere nwa nwa Mahatma Gandhi, Arun Gandhi, n'ịhazi oge mba ụwa maka enweghị ike ime ihe ike
Dị ka nke Jenụwarị 2019, a na-eme ememe oge maka enweghị mmegide gburugburu ụwa dị ka ohere "ịkpọkọta obodo ọnụ, na-enye ha ike iche echiche na nyere aka ịmepụta ụwa na-adịghị eme ihe ike."
N'akwụkwọ ya, Shadow Medicine: The Placebo in Conventional and Alternative Therapies, John S
Haller na-adọ aka ná ntị na ụzọ ọzọ e si abịarute ọgwụ, dị ka nke Mary Morrissey na-enye, ekwesịghị ka e were dochie anya ọgwụ nkịtị
